sentence.Network_en: The tidal stream or current gradually decreases in the shallows.
sentence.Network_cn: 浅滩上的潮水逐渐退去。

sentence.Network_en: At dusk more fish come into the shallows.
sentence.Network_cn: 黄昏时分，更多的鱼游到了浅水区。

sentence.Network_en: There are dangerous rocks and shallows near the island.
sentence.Network_cn: 岛的附近有险礁和浅滩.

entry.def: The shallows are the shallow part of an area of water.

example.ex: At dusk more fish come into the shallows.
example.tran: 黄昏时分，更多的鱼游到了浅水区。

auth_sentence.content: The two-mile long island is edged with turquoise shallows.
auth_sentence.res_content: The two-mile long island is edged with turquoise shallows.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The two-mile long island is edged with turquoise shallows.

auth_sentence.content: Its pearl-white sands are lapped by pale shallows.
auth_sentence.res_content: Its pearl-white sands are lapped by pale shallows.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Its pearl-white sands are lapped by pale shallows.

auth_sentence.content: There was even a patch of ice in the slacker shallows.
